definition: recorded media (CD and DVD)/sound and movies
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Only videos related to ThomasJack are allowed.
sentences.chinese: 只允許有關東於哲的影音。

sentences.english: Freddy sees his coworker Xiu-ping watching an online video.
sentences.chinese: 福瑞迪看到他的同事秀芳在看線上影音。

sentences.english: Convert any video file on your PC into a phone-friendly video file.
sentences.chinese: 在計算機端轉換成適合您的移動設備的影音文件。

sentences.english: Film, an audio-visual text type, is a medium of mass communication.
sentences.chinese: 電影是一種大衆傳播媒體，屬於影音文本類型。

sentences.english: Feng Xin of CEO of windstorm image sound expresses, windstorm also is one of victims.
sentences.chinese: 暴風影音CEO馮鑫表示，暴風也是受害者之一。

sentences.english: This is one of the first projects that we have done.
sentences.chinese: 火晶之祕這是傑德創意影音製作的最早期的作品。

sentences.english: This library of books and electronic audio-visual media is only for our members to use.
sentences.chinese: 本圖書館之書籍及電子影音媒體僅供本會會員使用。

sentences.english: The predecessor that this is windstorm image sound.
sentences.chinese: 這就是暴風影音的前身。

sentences.english: SERVICE&QUALITY is a professional design company dedicated in providing Multimedia chip solutions.
sentences.chinese: 本企業是一家多媒體影音處理晶片的專業設計公司。

sentences.english: Car audio navigation, electronic products, anti-theft devices.
sentences.chinese: 汽車影音導航，電子產品，防盜器。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
standard definition (TV or video image quality)
